docs.abstract: A smaller number of companies control of a greater portion of TV shows and films, potentially altering where — and how — we see our favorite series, movies or actors.
docs.snippet: A smaller number of companies control of a greater portion of TV shows and films, potentially altering where — and how — we see our favorite series, movies or actors.
docs.lead_paragraph: A smaller number of companies control of a greater portion of TV shows and films, potentially altering where — and how — we see our favorite series, movies or actors.

headline.main: How Mega-Mergers Are Changing the Way You Watch Your Favorite Shows and Movies

docs.abstract: Doctors and public health workers in San Francisco are preparing to track injuries from electric scooters and the other transportation services blossoming in the city.
docs.snippet: Doctors and public health workers in San Francisco are preparing to track injuries from electric scooters and the other transportation services blossoming in the city.
docs.lead_paragraph: A hospital conference room is an unlikely place to assess a budding transportation revolution, but a team of San Francisco trauma specialists and researchers who gathered there sees its work as essential to ensuring the safety of residents in a city of high-tech guinea pigs.

headline.main: Health Officials Prepare to Track Electric Scooter Injuries
headline.print_headline: Skinned Knees to Broken Heads: Tracking Scooter Injuries

docs.abstract: Chris Pratt and other stars derided the “mob mentality” that led Disney to oust the writer-director James Gunn. But just how should studios handle transgressions made during a more anything-goes era?
docs.snippet: Chris Pratt and other stars derided the “mob mentality” that led Disney to oust the writer-director James Gunn. But just how should studios handle transgressions made during a more anything-goes era?
docs.lead_paragraph: Deriding what they called “mob mentality,” Chris Pratt and his “Guardians of the Galaxy” castmates released a letter of support on Monday for the director James Gunn, who was fired from the “Guardians” franchise on July 20 after offensive jokes he wrote on Twitter were resurfaced by online vigilantes.

headline.main: ‘Guardians of the Galaxy’ Firing Prompts Pushback in Hollywood
headline.print_headline: Hollywood Pushes Back on Firing of ‘Guardians of the Galaxy’ Director

docs.abstract: Conventional wisdom says the two companies should be blocked from merging to preserve competition and benefit consumers. But the merger could actually create a mightier maverick.
docs.snippet: Conventional wisdom says the two companies should be blocked from merging to preserve competition and benefit consumers. But the merger could actually create a mightier maverick.
docs.lead_paragraph: There has been no shortage of opinions about the proposed merger of T-Mobile and Sprint. Just about the only person who hasn’t said something is President Trump.

headline.main: T-Mobile and Sprint: How Fewer Competitors Could Increase Competition
headline.print_headline: A Maverick With the Might To Cut Prices

docs.abstract: A U.S. senator and a panel in Britain’s House of Commons have offered some of the first firm suggestions to address issues relating to privacy and misinformation.

docs.abstract: India’s Aditya Birla Group agreed to buy Aleris, an American aluminum maker, for $2.6 billion after the Trump administration rejected a bid by a Chinese firm.
docs.snippet: India’s Aditya Birla Group agreed to buy Aleris, an American aluminum maker, for $2.6 billion after the Trump administration rejected a bid by a Chinese firm.
docs.lead_paragraph: MUMBAI, India — Last year, the Trump administration blocked a Chinese company from buying an Ohio-based aluminum maker, Aleris, citing concerns about national security.

headline.main: Indian Firm Wants Ohio Aluminum Maker. Will Trump Approve?
headline.print_headline: Indian Aluminum Maker Tiptoes Into Ohio

docs.abstract: Apple’s Reader tool doesn’t outright block advertisements, but it can temporarily isolate the page text so you can read without distractions.
